original: 正史無此人，《演義》稱其為南蠻王孟獲之弟。曾與孟獲合謀施計詐降，但被識破。之後又向兄長推薦朵思大王，但仍舊失敗被擒。最後同孟獲歸降蜀漢。
text: There is no such person in the official history, "The Romance" called him the younger brother of Nanban king Meng Huo. Conspired with Meng Huo to commit a surrender, but was seen through. Later, he recommended King Dosi to his brother, but he still failed and was captured. Finally, he returned to Shu Han with Meng Huo.
